``` python

ΰΉ ΰΉ
β/start -  BOT START 
β/help -  HELP 
β/allrepo - AFTER COMMAND USE ANG GITHUB USERNAME
β/op - FOR EVAL 
β/create_repo -  NEW GITHUB REPO CREATED USE COMMAND /create_repo <ANY NAME>
β/delrepo - DELETE ANY GITHUB REPO USE COMMAND AFTER <REPO URL>
β/add_collaborator - ADD COLLABORATION USING COMMAND AFTER <URL> ANY USERNAME FOR COLLABORATION 
β/remove_collaborator - REMOVE COLLABORATION USING COMMAND AFTER <URL> ANY USERNAME FOR COLLABORATION
